sentences.en: The company will design and develop a digitally enhanced night vision goggle as part of the US Army's enhanced night vision goggles program.
sentences.cn: 公司将设计并开发一种数字化增强夜视护目镜作为美国陆军增强型夜视镜计划的一部分。

sentences.en: Innovative partnerships of digitally linked producers, suppliers, service providers, and customers are accelerating productivity and generating wealth in entirely new ways.
sentences.cn: 数字化连接的生产者、供应商、服务提供者和客户的创新伙伴关系正在以全新的方式加速生产力和创造财富。

sentences.en: All the tracks have been digitally remastered from the original tapes.
sentences.cn: 所有的曲子都已经从原始录音带转录到了数码母带上。
